useCase.name: Perform Actions with Different Components
useCase.description: Allows the user to interact with various components.

preconditions.precondition: The system components are properly initialized.

successEndConditions.condition: All user interactions with components are successful.

failureEndConditions.condition: Any user interaction with components fails.

mainSequence.step: User sends a request to the actor component.
Actor component processes the request.
Actor component responds to the user.
User sends a request to the boundary component.
Boundary component processes the request.
Boundary component sends data to the user.
User sends a request to the control component.
Control component manages the request.
Control component provides feedback to the user.
User sends a request to the entity component.
Entity component processes the request.
Entity component updates the data.
User sends a request to the database component.
Database component stores the data.
Database component sends confirmation to the user.
User sends a request to the collections component.
Collections component handles the request.
Collections component returns the result to the user.
User sends a request to the queue component.
Queue component processes the request.
Queue component sends acknowledgment to the user.
